description: Crytek has developed three versions of CryENGINE: CryENGINE 1, CryENGINE 2, and CryENGINE 3. These engines have been used for games such as Far Cry, Crysis, and Entropia Universe. The engines support both PC and console platforms.
NOTE: CRY map files are created using Sandbox, a tool included with the CryENGINE software.
